T02TD1626E:226b-1: ma h'a m'a y'a s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02TD1626E:226b-3: sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD1626E:226b-5: mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1626E:226b-6: dang por snga bar langs la snying rje dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying gar padma'i steng du thig le dpa' bo ba ltas la /
T02TD1626E:226b-7: de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang /
T02TD1626E:226b-9: rnal 'byor ma rnams yang dag par bskul nas /
T02TD1626E:226b-10: bar snang la dmigs par byas la mchod pa gsum gyis mchod par byas te /
T02TD1626E:226b-11: de rnams kyi mdun du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshigs bcad dag brjod par bya ba ni 'di'o //
T02TD1626E:226b-12: aom dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs rdul rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1626E:226b-13: aom dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1626E:227a-0: aom dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la phyag 'tshal @227a * //
T02TD1626E:227a-2: / zhes pa 'di dag brjod nas cho ga bzhin du /
T02TD1626E:227a-4: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD1626E:227a-5: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02TD1626E:227a-6: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02TD1626E:227a-7: byang chub tu sems bskyed ba dang lam bsten pa dang /
T02TD1626E:227a-8: bdag gi dngos po dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1626E:227a-9: de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sngon du bsgom pas /
T02TD1626E:227a-10: stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ba ni /
T02TD1626E:227a-11: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1626E:227a-13: 'di'i de ma thag tu yi ge ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i steng du yi ge h'um gnas pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1626E:227a-14: de'i 'od zer gyis khyad par dang /
T02TD1626E:227a-15: de dag thams cad yongs su zhu ba las sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1626E:227a-18: dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa la /
T02TD1626E:227a-19: rdo rje nag po'i phreng bas mtha' ma yongs su bskor bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1626E:227a-20: yang na klu lhag ma can gyi rim pas so //
T02TD1626E:227a-21: padma'i lte ba'i dbus su dbyangs yig aa la sogs pa nyis 'gyur du byas te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1626E:227a-22: de'i steng du yi ge drug po bsnan pa'i yi ge ka la sogs pa nyis 'gyur du byas te nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1626E:227a-23: me long lta bu zla bar yang dag bshad //
T02TD1626E:227a-24: mnyam pa nyid ni nyi mar rab tu grags //
T02TD1626E:227a-25: 'di dag dbus su thig le'i rgyal po ste //
T02TD1626E:227a-26: 'di la spro bsdu 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02TD1626E:227a-27: so sor rtog pas bya ba nan tan no //
T02TD1626E:227a-28: rdzogs pa shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD1626E:227a-29: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid 'khor lo bsgom //
T02TD1626E:227a-30: de nas snying rje'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1626E:227a-31: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni sngon po ste /
T02TD1626E:227a-35: ljang gu'i zhal bzhi pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD1626E:227a-36: phyag bzhi ni thod pa dang /
T02TD1626E:227a-38: g-yon na kha t'am ga dang /
T02TD1626E:227a-40: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba /
T02TD1626E:227a-41: thod pas bcings pa dang stag lpags kyi smad g-yogs dang /
T02TD1626E:227a-46: mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba ste /
T02TD1626E:227a-47: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa /
T02TD1626E:227a-48: mi mgo brgya phyed kyi phreng ba dang /
T02TD1626E:227a-49: mi'i rus pa'i rkang gdub pa dang /
T02TD1626E:227b-1: dpung rgyan rnams kyi rgyan can /
T02TD1626E:227b-2: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs shing /
T02TD1626E:227b-4: kha dog lnga'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba can /
T02TD1626E:227b-5: rang nyid lta bu'i shes rab la 'khyud pa can du bdag nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1626E:227b-6: shes rab kyang bdag nyid dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1626E:227b-7: 'on kyang gcer bu mgo'i phreng ba dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1626E:227b-9: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma kha dog sngon mo //
T02TD1626E:227b-13: ljang gu'i zhal ba zhi pa /
T02TD1626E:227b-14: phyag bzhi dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1626E:227b-20: rin chen mkha' 'gro ma ser mo ste /
T02TD1626E:227b-29: ce sbyang phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1626E:227b-30: nub kyi 'dab ma la padma mkha' 'gro ma kha dog dkar dmar te /
T02TD1626E:227b-34: ljang gu'i zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1626E:227b-38: thod pa rnams phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1626E:227b-39: byang gi 'dab ma la sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma kha dog ljang gu ste /
T02TD1626E:227b-44: phyag bzhi dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1626E:227b-48: ka p'a la rnams phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1626E:227b-49: de lta bu rnam par bsgoms pa'i snying gar man ngag ji lta ba las thig le'i rgyal po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1626E:227b-52: skye mched kyi rang gi ngo bo khams gsum pa ni sgyu ma dang /
T02TD1626E:227b-55: dri za'i grong khyer lta bur rang gi sems dang tha mi dad pa /
T02TD1626E:227b-56: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar phyi nang gi gzugs la rnal 'byor pas bsam mo //
T02TD1626E:227b-57: de nas de ma thag tu ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bkug ste /
T02TD1626E:227b-58: dam tshig gi 'khor lor bcug la /
T02TD1626E:227b-59: aom dha rma dh'a tu sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes ba rgyal bya'o //
T02TD1626E:227b-60: de nas a'a:dmar po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD1626E:228a-1: bhr'um tr'am hr'im:zhes pa'i yi ge rnams shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i kha dog dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1626E:228a-2: yi ge h'um gis rdo rje rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD1626E:228a-3: glu 'di dag gis bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD1626E:228a-4: kye grogs mo mchog ni bdag cag go //
T02TD1626E:228a-5: padma'i kha yis rnam dbye bar //
T02TD1626E:228a-6: 'od gsal pa yi rdo rje yis //
T02TD1626E:228a-7: bde ba nyid mdzod aa la la la la ho //
T02TD1626E:228a-8: glu 'di dag gis de ma thag tu rjes su chags pas mchod cing byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD1626E:228a-9: de'i rjes su bdud rtsi myang bar bya ba ni thod pa lag tu bzhag par bi dang /
T02TD1626E:228a-19: a'a li k'a li 'di dag gis byin gyis brlabs shing /
T02TD1626E:228a-20: phyin ci log gi yi ge gsum gyis kyang byin gyis brlabs pas yi ge de rnams las mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'thon te /
T02TD1626E:228a-21: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi rnams phyag tu blangs nas yi ge rnams nyid la zhugs pas bdud rtsi dang lhan cig tu ro gcig par gyur par bsams te /
T02TD1626E:228a-22: yi ge gsum pos rim pa dang rim pa ma yin pas spro zhing bsdu ba ni sku gsungs thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi mdog tu'o //
T02TD1626E:228a-23: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba 'di dag ji lta ba'i man ngag gis bzla'o //
T02TD1626E:228a-24: ji ltar nus par bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02TD1626E:228a-25: de nyid gsum dang yi ge mu:sa ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1626E:228a-26: lha mo bzhi la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1626E:228a-27: thig le'i nang du bcug pa /
T02TD1626E:228a-28: smon lam btab par byas la ji ltar bde bar 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1626E:228a-29: thun mtshams gzhan rnams su ni /
T02TD1626E:228a-30: de nyid gsum po brjod pas sngar gyi de bzhin du ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te /
T02TD1626E:228a-31: gcig tu byas la rjes su chags pa la sogs pa dag kyang bya'o //
T02TD1626E:228a-32: sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid au rgyan gyi yul du byon nas gsungs pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1626E:228a-34: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa wa dh'um t'i pa'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02TD1626E:228a-35: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong sh'akya brtson 'grus kyis zhus te bsgyur ba'o /
